items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and shape
items.body: This was a beautiful dress. It would flatter any shape. The material was high quality. The only reason I sent it back was the sleeves were not to the elbow like the picture. Read more
items.author: RIVER

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stylish but a little short if you are a taller person and the pockets are...hmm...
items.body: Ordered this dress for my wife, who is 5'7". It fits her really well and true to size - it's a very comfortable dress, and it's a cute design that looks dressy enough to wear out to a nice dinner but casual enough to wear to say, a more relaxed gathering, a concert, etc. It is a bit too short to look professional to wear to work based on her height. For someone who is a bit shorter, it is a great length though, so keep that in mind. (They were not kidding when they said this is a "mini" dress - it is very much styled that way) One thing I want to mention - it's not a bad thing, but I'm not sure if it's a good one, either LOL. This dress has pockets! YAY! BUT...they are strangely...right in the front. As in...like a sweatshirt/hoodie does - kangaroo style. That gives you extra fabric in that area and while it's not a huge deal and not sticking out ridiculously - it's still a little...awkward? Let's put it this way - if you are someone who is always worried about clothing making you look heavier than you are, then this is probably not a good dress for you. If you are hanging on to a little extra weight (and who among us isn't, right?) then this might make you look a little heavier in this area, depending on your shape. I did not take a star off for this because it's not really a "flaw" of the dress, and hey...at least it HAS pockets. If you are slim then this is probably not going to be an issue for you, but I did want to mention it as something to consider. Other than that, the dress is great - it's well made with nice quality fabric, and it's a great "go-to" little black dress. It's priced about in line with other DKNY clothing. I would definitely still recommend it - but I would definitely keep the pocket issue in mind in case you think that will be a problem for you. Read more
items.author: Marilyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant style with classic chic lines
items.body: This DKNY fit-and-flare mini dress offers a classic silhouette that’s both flattering and versatile. The jewel neckline keeps the design clean and elegant, while the fitted bodice and flared skirt create balanced proportions. Short sleeves make it suitable for year-round wear, either on its own or layered with outerwear. The structure of the dress provides a polished look without feeling stiff, making it comfortable for extended wear. It works well for professional settings, social gatherings, or semi-formal events depending on accessories. The timeless shape ensures it won’t feel dated, and the DKNY craftsmanship adds confidence in fit and durability. It’s a reliable wardrobe staple that’s easy to dress up or down. Pros include flattering fit-and-flare silhouette, classic jewel neckline, comfortable short sleeves, versatile styling options, polished structure, easy day-to-night wear, timeless design, quality fabric, dependable fit, and strong brand value. Read more
items.author: Madison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfortable, and Beautifully Made Dress
items.body: This DKNY fit and flare dress is absolutely stunning in person. The red color is vibrant and elegant without being too bold, and the jewel neckline adds a sophisticated touch and the fit is extremely flattering, creating a clean silhouette that works well for both daytime and evening events. The fabric feels soft, breathable, and high quality it moves nicely without clinging, and it is a beautiful dress. The length is perfect for a mini dress, and the cut gives it a polished, tailored appearance without sacrificing comfort. It holds its shape throughout the day and still feels comfortable whether sitting, walking, or dancing. It pairs well with heels or flats, and the simplicity of the design makes it easy to accessorize. If you want a dress that looks refined, feels comfortable, and is made with great attention to detail, this DKNY piece is an excellent choice. It is versatile, flattering, and beautifully crafted and the red is great for the season. Read more
items.author: D. T.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice red color but not high quality
items.body: Things that I like about this dress: * The red color is fantastic * It's comfortable and true to size * The style and cut of the dress is timeless and pretty cute * I love how the pockets are hidden in the princess seams What a don't like: * It's polyester and feels like polyester, so it doesn't feel high quality * The facings (the small pieces of lining around the neck and cuffs) are visible through the top fabric. (See the sleeve photo.) * The gold buttons are kind of sad and floppy (I'll probably cut them off) For me, the dress is only okay. If I could return it, I would. Read more
items.author: Scout

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Travel Ready
items.body: This dress is practical and polished, but it didn’t fully meet my expectations. The fit is flattering in the waist and flares nicely, and the jewel neckline adds a professional touch. The material is lightweight and wrinkle-resistant, which makes it convenient for packing. However, the fabric feels a bit too thin and unstructured for colder seasons without layering. What I Like: Classic shape that works for daytime or evening Doesn’t wrinkle easily and ideal for travel Simple, clean neckline Versatile for layering with jackets or cardigans Concerns: Fabric is thinner than expected and lacks lining May cling slightly depending on undergarments Runs just a little short if you're taller Overall, it’s a decent piece for quick trips or office days but would benefit from a slightly more substantial fabric. Read more
items.author: Ramses

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Orchid, Red, Marine, Ck Pine, Black, Scarlet. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
